newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin down 20 cents to 14.08 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin down 20 cents to 14.08 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell 20 cents to 14.08 ringgit ($5.62) a kg, in reaction to a sharp fall on the London Metal Exchange (LME) overnight, traders said.
"Buying was extraordinarily low but there was lots of selling as they (players) wanted the market to follow the LME," said a trader. The London market fell $95 on Thursday.

Initial bids only totalled five tonnes against offers of 87. Turnover fell to 77 tonnes from 101 tonnes on Thursday, and buyers were from Japan, Europe and Malaysia. The local premium over the LME widened slightly to $65 a tonne from $55.
